title: Name Matters!
caption: International Civil Aviation Organization Excludes Taiwan from Assembly
preview: The International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO), a United Nations specialized agency created in 1944, held its 39th Assembly in Montreal from September 27 to October 7 this year, which formulates regulations and standards that are to be adopted by countries all over the world in order to create a â€œsafe, efficient, secure, economically sustainable and environmentally responsible civil aviation sector.

title: Love Matters!
caption: Make Taiwan first gay marriage legalized...
preview: Taiwan is a liberal country and likely to become the first gay-marriage country in Asia, and we are very proud to entitle and share with LGBTQ groups all over the world.
